ack.p: The authors wish to thank Dr. Scott Holmberg Division of Viral Hepatitis, CDC, for editorial assistance, as well as the CDC Epidemiology Elective Program for its support of co-author Perry Dubin.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: The findings and conclusions in this paper are those of the authors, and do not necessarily represent the official position of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
